column4: Hey, anyone have any idea why my wireless card works in feisty liveCD but not when it is installed?
which one?
atheros
hmm, have you gone into the restriced driver manager?
it fixed itself automagically! network manager is an fiddly app
why?  it is one release
pidgin is just GAIM 2.0 Beta7
NOOOOO
it is horible, don't use any of those crap scripts
what do you want to use it for
easy ubunutu is just as bad
those are simple
they are garbage.  make sure you have all the repositories enabled in synaptic, then search for flash non-free, sun-java6
also, install gstreamer0.10 good bad ugly including multiverse versions
also install the xine/libxine ffmpeg plugin, and get a real media player (VLC/Mplayer)
mozilla-mplayer
